몬스터(해충)

MONSTERS (VERMIN)

These creatures operate on instinct, driven by simple needs such as food and reproduction. Except where noted, vermin 공격 only when hungry or threatened.

Vermin Traits: Vermin possess the following traits (unless otherwise noted in a creature의 entry).

—Mindless: No 지능 score, and immunity to all 정신영향계 effects (charms, compulsions, phantasms, patterns, and morale effects).

—암흑시야 out to 60 feet.

—성향: Always neutral. Vermin are not governed by a human sense of morality.

—전리품: Vermin generally possess no 전리품. For those that do, this 전리품 consists of possessions formerly owned by a creature that the monster has killed.

거대 개미

GIANT ANT
거대 개미, 일꾼 거대 개미, Soldier 거대 개미, 여왕
Medium Vermin Medium Vermin Large Vermin

선제권: +0 +0 –1
속도: 50 ft. (10 squares), 등반 20 ft. 50 ft. (10 squares), 등반 20 ft. 40 ft. (8 squares)

전리품: None None 1/10 동전; 50% goods; 50% items
성장: 3–4 HD (Medium); 5–6 HD (Large) 3–4 HD (Medium); 5–6 HD (Large) 5–6 HD (Large); 7–8 HD (Huge)
레벨 보정: — — —

거대 개미 are among the hardiest and most adaptable vermin. Soldiers and 일꾼 are about 6 feet long, while 여왕 can grow to a length of 9 feet.

Acid Sting (Ex): A 거인 soldier ant has a stinger and an acid-producing gland in its abdomen. If it successfully grabs an opponent, it can attempt to sting each round (+3 공격 보너스). A hit with the sting 공격 deals 1d4+1 points of piercing 피해 and 1d4 points of acid 피해.

Improved Grab (Ex): To use this ability, a 거대 개미 must hit with its bite 공격. A 거인 soldier ant that wins the ensuing 드잡이 check establishes a hold and can sting.

스킬: *거대 개미 have a +4 racial 보너스 on 생존 checks when tracking by 냄새 and a +8 racial 보너스 on 등반 checks. A 거대 개미 can always choose to take 10 on 등반 checks, even if rushed or threatened.

거대 꿀벌

GIANT BEE
Medium Vermin
히트 다이스: 3d8 (13 hp)
선제권: +2
속도: 20 ft. (4 squares), 비행 80 ft. (good)
방어도: 14 (+2 Dex, +2 natural), touch 12, flat-footed 12

특기: —

전리품: No 동전; 1/4 goods (honey only); no items
성장: 4–6 HD (Medium); 7–9 HD (Large)
레벨 보정: —

Although many times larger, growing to a length of about 5 feet, 거대 꿀벌 behave generally the same as their smaller cousins. 거대 꿀벌 are usually not aggressive except when defending themselves or their hive.

독(Ex): Injury, Fortitude DC 11, initial and secondary 피해 1d4 Con. The save DC is 건강-based. A 거대 꿀벌 that successfully stings another creature pulls away, leaving its stinger in the creature. The bee then dies.

스킬: 거대 꿀벌 have a +4 racial 보너스 on 감지 checks. *They also have a +4 racial 보너스 on 생존 checks to orient themselves.

These creatures feed primarily on carrion and offal, gathering heaps of the stuff in which to build nests and lay eggs. A 거대 폭탄먼지벌레 is about 6 feet long. 거대 폭탄먼지벌레 normally 공격 only to defend themselves, their nests, or their eggs.

Acid Spray (Ex): When attacked or disturbed, the creature can release a 10-foot cone of acidic vapor once per round. Those within the cone must succeed on a DC 13 Fortitude save or take 1d4+2 points of acid 피해. The save DC is 건강-based.

These luminous nocturnal insects are prized by miners and adventurers. They have two glands, one above each eye, that produce a red glow. The glands’ luminosity persists for 1d6 days after removal from the beetle, illuminating a roughly circular 범위 with a 10-foot radius. 거대 화염벌레 are about 2 feet long.

These creatures are serious pests that greedily devour cultivated crops. A single beetle can strip an entire farm in short order. An adult 거대 사슴벌레 is about 10 feet long.

짓밟기(Ex): Reflex half DC 19. The save DC is 근력-based.

This patient carnivore remains completely still as it waits for prey to come near.

Improved Grab (Ex): To use this ability, a 거대 사마귀 must hit with its claws 공격. If it wins the ensuing 드잡이 check, it establishes a hold and makes a bite 공격 as a primary 공격(at its full +6 공격 보너스).

스킬: A 거대 사마귀 has a +4 racial 보너스 on 숨기 and 감지 checks. *Because of its camouflage, 숨기 보너스 increases to +12 when a mantis is surrounded by foliage.

All 괴물 거미 are aggressive predators that use their poisonous bites to subdue or kill prey.

괴물 거미 come in two general types: hunters and 거미줄-spinners. Hunters rove about, while 거미줄-spinners usually attempt to trap prey. Hunting spiders can spin 거미줄 to use as lairs, but cannot use their 거미줄 as 무기 the way 거미줄-spinners can. A hunting spider has a 기본 육상 속도 10 feet faster than the figures given in 수치 표.

독(Ex): A 괴물 거미 has a poisonous bite. The details vary by the spider의 size, as shown on the table below. The save DCs are 건강-based. The indicated 피해 is initial

and secondary 피해.

Size Fort DC 피해 Size Fort DC 피해
Tiny 10 1d2 Str Huge 16 1d8 Str
Small 10 1d3 Str Gargantuan 20 2d6 Str
Medium 12 1d4 Str Colossal 28 2d8 Str
Large 13 1d6 Str

거미줄(Ex): Both types of 괴물 거미 often wait in their 거미줄 or in trees, then lower themselves silently on silk strands and leap onto prey passing beneath. A single strand is strong enough to support the spider and one creature of the same size. 거미줄-spinners can throw a 거미줄 eight times per day. This is similar to an 공격 with a net but has a maximum 거리 of 50 feet, with a 거리 increment of 10 feet, and is effective against targets up to one size category larger than the spider. An entangled creature can escape with a successful 탈출 전문가 check or 폭발 it with a 근력 check. Both are 표준 행동 whose DCs are given in the table below. The check DCs are 건강-based, and 근력 check DC includes a +4 racial 보너스.

거미줄-spinners often create sheets of sticky webbing from 5 to 60 feet square, depending on the size of the spider. They usually position these sheets to 올무 flying creatures but can also try to trap prey on the ground. Approaching creatures must succeed on a DC 20 감지 check to notice a 거미줄; otherwise they stumble into it and become trapped as though by a successful 거미줄 공격. Attempts to escape or 폭발 the webbing gain a +5 보너스 if the trapped creature has something to walk on or grab while pulling free. Each 5-foot section has 히트 포인트 given on the table, and sheet 거미줄 have 피해 축소 5/—.

A 괴물 거미 can 이동 across its own 거미줄 at its 등반 속도 and can pinpoint the location of any creature touching its 거미줄.

Size 탈출 전문가 DC Break DC 히트 포인트
Tiny 10 14 2
Small 10 14 4
Medium 12 16 6
Large 13 17 12
Huge 16 20 14
Gargantuan 20 24 16
Colossal 28 32 18

열감지(Ex): A 괴물 거미 can detect and pinpoint any creature or object within 60 feet in contact with the ground, or within any 거리 in contact with the spider의 거미줄.

스킬: 괴물 거미 have a +4 racial 보너스 on 숨기 and 감지 checks and a +8 racial 보너스 on 등반 checks. A 괴물 거미 can always choose to take 10 on 등반 checks, even if rushed or threatened. 괴물 거미 use either their 근력 or 민첩 수정치 for 등반 checks, whichever is

higher. *Hunting spiders have a +10 racial 보너스 on 도약 checks and a +8 racial 보너스 on 감지 checks. 거미줄-spinning spiders have a +8 racial 보너스 on 숨기 and 조용히 이동 checks when using their 거미줄.
